DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy two dos two commercially available vaccine use prevent Haemophilus influenzae type b infection child 6-12 month age .
DOC.brief_title: Study Infants ( 6-12 Months ) Comparing Two Doses Monovalent Glycoprotein-Conjugated ( Diptheria Toxin -CRM197 ) Vaccine Versus Tetanus Toxoid-Conjugated Vaccine Available Prevention Haemophilus Influenzae Type b Infections China
DOC.criteria: Infants 612 month age . Prior Hib vaccine administration . History serious reaction ( ) follow vaccination . Any vaccination within 14 day study vaccination . Known suspected immune impairment . For additional entry criterion please refer protocol .
